abstract: The out-of-this-world looks from the two pop stars can be re-created this Halloween with items you might already own.
snippet: The out-of-this-world looks from the two pop stars can be re-created this Halloween with items you might already own.
lead_paragraph: WHEN New Yorkers want Halloween costumes with sartorial flair, they skip costume shops and drugstores and head instead to the Patricia Field boutique in the Bowery, where glitter wigs and bondage pants are the everyday garb of Ms. Field's regular customers.

headline.main: Embracing the Pop Star in Your Closet
